title: Ep. 213 - Mission Her Protection by Anna Hackett
itunes:title: Ep. 213 - Mission Her Protection by Anna Hackett
description:
Hey HBs!!!!!! It's our annual Veteran's Day event! I hope you're ready for an action-packed ride complete with roof dives and murder yetis! Mission: Her Protection was a super fun romp with a scientist heroine and an extra secret special ops man who were friends as children and are reunited when an arctic mission goes very wrong. It's non-stop and served up some good sex scenes!
 Bonus Content: Erin's new Classifications of Military Romance (#scientistsin2022), the rules of doing science in the arctic and jungle, *Bing Boong Bong* Motorcycle Safety with Erin, and so much more! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Erin: This season of What We Do In the Shadows is the best season of this show and maybe any show. IT'S SO GOOD!
 Melody: External keyboards and mice. I'm not hunched over my laptop at my desk anymore and my body is so much happier! 
 Support for this episode comes from: 
  Second Chance Romance by Maggie Preston! Book 2 in her Hearts of Louisiana brings us more of the steamy rom-com elements Maggie Preston is a master at, and then adds a mystery!! Make sure to get this book. 
 Radish! Unlimited romance stories in a serialized format right from an app on your device, and it's free! Go to radish.social/hb to sign up today! By going through our link, you get a 12 coin bonus!!
  
 Make sure to check out Mel's new podcast Bonkers Romance! 
 Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)
 Get more content on PATREON!!
 Sign up for our Newsletter! 
 MERCH! Teepublic, https://chicalookate.myshopify.com/collections/heaving-bosom (Chicaloo Kate), Redbubble
 Make your life better and hire Natalie to assist you!!!
 And follow our socials: 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosoms
 Patreon Shout Out:
 Cora C., you were descended from Minerva. The Roman goddess of defensive warfare, justice, poetry, wisdom, weaving, trade, medicine, crafts, and more but at this point I’m too tired to soldier on. You come from a long lineage of multi taskers and jacks of all trade, but you also manage to master those you’re most passionate about. Minerva had her trusty owl, which symbolized wisdom and knowledge and through the generations that has evolved into a keen awareness of your surroundings. Even though you can’t turn your head 270 degrees, not many situations can catch you unawares.
  
  
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
Check out Literary Souvenirs for all your Bookish and BTS Merch! 
Bookish Merch IG : http://instagram.com/literarysouvenirs
BTS Merch IG : https://instagram.com/btssouvenirs
Twitter : https://twitter.com/abooktrotter
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/literarysouvenirs (Literary Souvenirs Etsy!)
July 2022 Bonkers Book Club! 
Join the Temple of Defiant Joy! July 2022 is offering you: the box set of Nicola Davidson's Surrey SFS series, Brutal Prince by Sophie Lark, and AUDIOBOOK Obsession by K. Lorrainne and Meg Anne, duet narration performed by Stella Hunter, Shane East, Aaron Shedlock, JF Harding, Jason Clarke, and James Joseph.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/bbc (Bonkers Book Club!)
content:encoded:
Hey HBs!!!!!! It's our annual Veteran's Day event! I hope you're ready for an action-packed ride complete with roof dives and murder yetis! Mission: Her Protection was a super fun romp with a scientist heroine and an extra secret special ops man who were friends as children and are reunited when an arctic mission goes very wrong. It's non-stop and served up some good sex scenes!

Bonus Content: Erin's new Classifications of Military Romance (#scientistsin2022), the rules of doing science in the arctic and jungle, *Bing Boong Bong* Motorcycle Safety with Erin, and so much more! 

Lady Loves: 

Erin: This season of What We Do In the Shadows is the best season of this show and maybe any show. IT'S SO GOOD!

Melody: External keyboards and mice. I'm not hunched over my laptop at my desk anymore and my body is so much happier! 

Support for this episode comes from: 

Second Chance Romance by Maggie Preston! Book 2 in her Hearts of Louisiana brings us more of the steamy rom-com elements Maggie Preston is a master at, and then adds a mystery!! Make sure to get this book. 

Radish! Unlimited romance stories in a serialized format right from an app on your device, and it's free! Go to radish.social/hb to sign up today! By going through our link, you get a 12 coin bonus!!

 

Make sure to check out Mel's new podcast Bonkers Romance!

Patreon Shout Out:

Cora C., you were descended from Minerva. The Roman goddess of defensive warfare, justice, poetry, wisdom, weaving, trade, medicine, crafts, and more but at this point I’m too tired to soldier on. You come from a long lineage of multi taskers and jacks of all trade, but you also manage to master those you’re most passionate about. Minerva had her trusty owl, which symbolized wisdom and knowledge and through the generations that has evolved into a keen awareness of your surroundings. Even though you can’t turn your head 270 degrees, not many situations can catch you unawares.

 

 

Mentioned in this episode:

Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!

This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone. You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more! Hey HBs!!!!!! It's our annual Veteran's Day event! I hope you're ready for an action-packed ride complete with roof dives and murder yetis! Mission: Her Protection was a super fun romp with a scientist heroine and an extra secret special ops man who were friends as children and are reunited when an arctic mission goes very wrong.
